    ImagineFormat.s
    ImagineFormat.save_header — Function.

    save_header(filename, header) writes a header dictionary in Imagine format.

    save_header(destname, srcname, img::AbstractArray, [T::Type = eltype(img)]) writes a .imagine file with name destname, using the .imagine file srcname as a template. Size and element type fields are updated from img and T, respectively.
